name: Goblick
description:
Reverse tower defence goblin factory simulator built for Global Game Jam 2017!

Release/Update Notes:

v0.2 - Jan 25th, 2017

  • Added blue tint on units slowed by glue
  • Game over only occurs when last moving wave is defeated
  • Added mobile touch controls
  • Fixed a few jam bugs
  • Made a few tweaks to numbers

v0.1 - Jan 21st, 2017

  • GGJ release.

Global Game Jam site: http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/goblick
